name: Inflight Pilot Training
about: Inflight Pilot Training is a premier flight school located in the Twin Cities, Minnesota, offering top-class pilot training and aircraft rental services. Our program is designed to provide a first-class experience, with instructors who are dedicated and passionate about teaching. We cater to various interests, whether you're looking to fly for leisure, business, or as a career. Our training programs include the Private Pilot license, serving as the foundational step for aspiring pilots. With a commitment to excellence and a focus on individualized instruction, we ensure an amazing program experience for all our students. For more information, feel free to contact us.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Airline Transport Pilot
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Multi-Engine Rating
Night Rating"]
